title: 怎么得到玩家的饥饿度？
author: Little_K小K
txt_content:
如题=Bukkit里好像没有player.hunger
这个东西

replies.author: q513902026
replies.txt_content:
Player
  float getExhaustion()
   Gets the players current exhaustion level.
Exhaustion controls how fast the food level drops. While you have a certain amount of exhaustion, your saturation will drop to zero, and then your food will drop to zero.

Returns:
Exhaustion level

本帖最后由 107874017 于 2016-4-6 21:53 编辑 

getFoodLevel()
就是这货了XD
其实楼上那个也可以x
不过我习惯这个
